Name: Caf√© Monico
Review Text: I loved herena our waitress she was kind and lovely. This was a better experience than Sexy Fish! Good food, pasta cooked correctly and a nice fresh selection on the menu. Name: Caf√© Monico

Name: Caf√© Monico

Name: Caf√© Monico
Review Text: Love this place. The atmosphere was great. We went here for my girlfriends birthday. Food was good and prices were ok for the area. Staff were friendly and kind.

Name: Caf√© Monico
Review Text: Lovely new restaurant from Soho House & Co. The layout is perfect, most tables offering a private space and a good view around the restaurant. The food is traditional European cuisine, excellently executed. Plenty of vegetarian options too.

Name: Caf√© Monico

Name: Caf√© Monico

Name: Caf√© Monico
